item.title: Beyond Borders: How OECD Pillar Two is Reshaping Global Tax Administration
item.description: An in-depth examination of OECD Pillar Two's implementation across jurisdictions outside the United States, exploring its administrative complexities, revenue implications, and the practical challenges tax authorities face in enforcing a coordinated global minimum tax framework.
